desc.p: Specifies which information is to be extracted. Valid inputs are "CURRENCY, LCY.AMOUNT, FCY.AMOUNT, COMPANY.CODE, ID, CUSTOMER, and DESCRIPTION".
MAP.FIELD and MAP.VALUE fields are associated multi value fields.
This field is used to mention the selection criteria for the selection record on the table.
Specifies from which field is to be extracted for the respective associated MAP.FIELD.
For example, LCY.AMOUNT mapped to a field ONLINE.CLEARED.BAL in account. MAP.FIELD and MAP.VALUE fields are associated multi value fields.
This field use to store the markup filed name.
This field is used to store the markup filed value.
This field is used to mention the name for extraction.
Example: If you extract the CASH accounts from the Account application, then specify the value as CASH ACCOUNT.
This field is used to define the table name.
This field specifies from which application that is to be extracted (E.g.: ACCOUNT).
This field specifies from which record to extract. If you need to extract any particular record then specify that id. (It is optional).
